title: Great scale, mediocre app
text:
*UPDATE: Since I wrote my initial review almost a year ago, there have been no app updates. It's not optimized for the iPhone 6, crashes more frequently, sometimes is slow to receive new measurements from the scale, doesn't support the Share Sheet, etc. so I'm knocking off one star.*

The weighing scale itself is great, and the app is decent but needs some improvements. You can't update the scale's wifi settings without setting up the scale from scratch. The user interface could be enhanced to make it more user friendly.

title: It crashes constantly
text: Just like some other people's feedback, the app crashes when you try to look at the historical data of the bottle feedings. This app can be very useful, especially if you buy the Withings baby scale but this bug renders the entire app basically useless. I have given this feedback repeatedly for 3 months without a response, any updates nor any feedback that they are working on the issue. Knowing how many bottles or how many ounces your baby is drinking a day is important data. There are other apps that do this... Though it doesn't automatically record the weight, I have switched over to Similac baby journal as it keeps all the information I need all in 1 app. This is truly such a shame... Seems like a simple fix but does not appear to be of any concern. I love the Withings products... I use the pulse health mate, the adult scale, the baby scale & the baby monitor. This app is the only product of theirs that I am truly disappointed and I have given them plenty of opportunity to fix this prior to my post.

title: Really needs diaper changing tracking function
text: This is just as important as knowing when the baby last fed.

title: Look at Withings App history!!
text:
Withings has such a poor support history. Geez. After the last iPhone update trying to look at weights in list mode basically results in the app crashing. You can only view weights via the graph!
I have owned several Withings products and they are all garbage. I will be returning the scale ASAP, thank goodness I bought it at a store with an excellent return policy and not through withings who has a terrible track record for returning customer inquiries and fixing issues!

title: Do not expect much!
text: This app only works for the sync with the kid's scale, forget the rest. All other functions may, if you are lucky, work for some time but they will then (suddenly and without any tangible cause) cease to operate, making all your history data (in our case of 7 weeks) useless because you will have to switch to another app that actually works. Use this only for the scale sync, nothing else. Support does not work, in fact I doubt that it exists...

title: Sync was a good surprise
text: Yes, u can sinc with other phones.  It does it automatically.  If u want to track weight and know how feelings are going, great device.  It is expensive but so easy to track.  If you are standing on scale and subtracting your weight...then get this scale!

title: Frustrating Buttons. Breaks Under iOS 7.1.1
text:
Similar to another Withings app, Healthmate, this app's buttons are very difficult to tap. It has strong "right-hand" bias and even using the right hand can often require multiple taps to make it respond.

May 1 update: It breaks under 7.1.1. Upon opening the table to review/delete a record, the app crashes.

title: Cool idea!
text: Easy to put together and use. Great for times in between doctor appointments when you're curious to see how your child is growing.

title: App crash on viewing list of feeding
text: When trying to get to the list of feedings the app crashes. Reinstall action of app does not fix this and it happens on multiple devices so it isn't a device problem. Please fix this issue. It has happened for at least the past 2-3 months

title: Update to the app to 64bits or it won't work with iOS11
text:
This app hasn't been updated in 4 years and won't work on any recent device (released after iPhone 5) when apple release its next major iOS version in September..
Please do something so that we can keep using the app with iOS 11.

title: Update?
text: Is this app still in development? Please update the app.

title: Poor UX
text: The app crashed the first two times I tried to set it up on my iPhone 5S, so it saved two entries for my baby. It won't let you delete or edit any of your information once it's been entered. I'm going to try another app that's been more thoroughly developed.

title: First use - crashed phone
text: First time using it, the app crashed. I don't have time for that to happen before I even put information in. Shame, the other Withings apps are much better and I use those all the time.

title: So disappointed.
text: I can't believe how terrible this app is. As other have commented, does not appear to have any stability with iPhone 6S/iOS 9. Random "length" updates happen. 30-40% of the time the weight does not upload.

title: Great scale crappy app
text: Avoid buying a $180 scale because Withings puts 0% effort in the app. It hasn't been updated since 2013 and it acts like it. I'm sorry I didn't pay attention to the app reviews before purchasing the scale 9 months ago.

title: I loved the app but they stopped updating it.
text: I only give 2 stars, because itâ€™s stopped working in iOS 11. All the history of 3 years just vanished :(. Please update the app.

title: Avoid this app
text:
Last update is 2013. No iPhone 6/6+ support so it looks awful.

App crashes when looking at historical data. It also stops working randomly for days at a time.

title: Well done
text: As I would expect a Withings App to be!

title: Mom
text: Overall easy to use

title: Inaccurate comparison
text: I do not know where the get percentile but we just came back from docs exam and our kid is in 72 percentile. This app is saying he is in 25 percentile which is impossible! Wasted my time setting it up!

title: Needs an update badly
text: When the hell the devs going to update the app? Table view of the measurements crash the app instantly.

title: Please update to make compatible with iOS updates
text: I keep records in this app and it's no longer compatible. Please update so I can use and access records

title: Used to be great, but years ago
text: Does not recognize my kid anymore... only as good as a traditional dumb scale.  Not going to trust Whitings with any other products, if this is the way they support them.

title: Great app for stastistics
text: Nice program and it is working great!

title: Inaccurate
text: Just what every parent wants to hear....that my breastfed 2 week old is "overweight".  Thanks, jerks.  My kid is 90th percentile across the board.  Not sure where their data comes from. I'm deleting this app and am glad I used my junk email address.

title: Great tracker
text: Awesome app! Very intuitive!

title: Nicely done
text: Very nice app, not to over crowded with info but just enough IMO. Works well on iPhone 5, wish there was an iPad version as well not just an iPhone on iPad but not everything can be perfect. Easy to use and straightforward.

title: Didnt like it
text: Complicated and not too useful
